name: Mrs, Anjali
caps: Being an obsessed thinker, a music fanatic and a terribly insane flapper (for some) defines me
md:
Being an obsessed thinker, a music fanatic and a terribly insane flapper (for some) defines me. Professionally, progress is the sound I love. Presently majoring in Political Science from IPCW, I'm known to be a bit of a geek (guilty)!

As someone who could never get tired of advocating equity I stand for gender equality, mental health and peaceful diplomacy in creating a super sustainable future
